message.content:
{
  "reasoning": "This is Round 1 post-bootstrap. I have a single root Orchestration product 'MenuSync MVP' that's too high-level and assigned to me (the chair). I need to decompose this into actionable work streams that align with the mission of building an intelligent menu sync platform. Looking at the mission requirements: unified dashboard, automatic sync, real-time inventory, dynamic pricing, and analytics. I should start with foundational decisions and core components. I need to assign work to operatives only, not keep it with myself.",

  "structureDelta": "Remove Orchestration: "MenuSync MVP"
Add Orchestration: "MenuSync Platform Architecture"
  > Decision: "Core Technical Architecture" [operative-1]
  > Decision: "Platform Integration Strategy" [operative-1]
Add Orchestration: "Product Strategy & User Experience"
  > Decision: "Target Restaurant Segment & Use Cases" [operative-2]
  > Decision: "MVP Feature Prioritization" [operative-2]
Add Orchestration: "Go-to-Market Foundation"
  > Decision: "Pricing Model & Customer Acquisition" [operative-3]
  > Decision: "Competitive Positioning Strategy" [operative-3]",

  "changes": [],

  "assignments": [
    {
      "productId": "temp:1",
      "assigneeIds": ["operative-1"],
      "directive": {
        "importance": "9",
        "comment": "**CORE OBJECTIVE:** Define the foundational technical architecture for real-time menu synchronization across multiple platforms.

**DEFINITION OF DONE:**
- Architecture diagram showing data flow between restaurants and platforms
- Technology stack selection (database, sync engine, API framework)
- Real-time sync strategy (webhooks vs polling vs hybrid)
- Scalability plan for handling multiple restaurant clients
- Integration approach for major POS systems and delivery platforms

**WHY IT MATTERS:** This decision determines whether we can deliver on the core promise of real-time sync without downtime, directly impacting restaurant profitability.

**CONTEXT:** Starting from scratch in Round 1, need foundational architecture before any implementation can begin."
      },
      "setRoundFocus": true
    },
    {
      "productId": "temp:2",
      "assigneeIds": ["operative-1"],
      "directive": {
        "importance": "8",
        "comment": "**CORE OBJECTIVE:** Define integration strategy for connecting with POS systems and delivery platforms.

**DEFINITION OF DONE:**
- Priority list of POS systems to integrate (Square, Toast, Resy, etc.)
- API analysis for major delivery platforms (DoorDash, UberEats, Grubhub)
- Authentication and data security requirements
- Standardized data mapping strategy across platforms
- Fallback mechanisms for platform API changes

**WHY IT MATTERS:** Restaurant adoption depends entirely on seamless integration with their existing tech stack.

**CONTEXT:** Critical foundation decision that must be made before architecture implementation begins."
      },
      "setRoundFocus": false
    },
    {
      "productId": "temp:3",
      "assigneeIds": ["operative-2"],
      "directive": {
        "importance": "9",
        "comment": "**CORE OBJECTIVE:** Define target restaurant segments and validate core use cases for menu management pain points.

**DEFINITION OF DONE:**
- Primary target segment definition (restaurant size, type, tech sophistication)
- Top 5 validated pain points in current menu management workflows
- User personas with specific operational contexts
- Workflow analysis of current manual menu update processes
- Success metrics for operational efficiency improvements

**WHY IT MATTERS:** Ensures we build for real restaurant needs, not assumptions, directly impacting product-market fit.

**CONTEXT:** Round 1 foundational research to guide all subsequent product decisions."
      },
      "setRoundFocus": false
    },
    {
      "productId": "temp:4",
      "assigneeIds": ["operative-2"],
      "directive": {
        "importance": "8",
        "comment": "**CORE OBJECTIVE:** Prioritize MVP features based on maximum impact on restaurant profitability and operational efficiency.

**DEFINITION OF DONE:**
- MVP feature list with clear justification for inclusion
- Feature impact scoring (time saved + error reduction + profit increase)
- User story mapping for core workflows
- Timeline for feature delivery in logical sequence
- Success criteria for each MVP feature

**WHY IT MATTERS:** Determines what we build first to deliver immediate value and prove the platform concept.

**CONTEXT:** Depends on target segment research, will guide technical implementation priorities."
      },
      "setRoundFocus": false
    },
    {
      "productId": "temp:5",
      "assigneeIds": ["operative-3"],
      "directive": {
        "importance": "8",
        "comment": "**CORE OBJECTIVE:** Define pricing model and customer acquisition strategy that aligns with restaurant economics.

**DEFINITION OF DONE:**
- Pricing model recommendation (per-location, transaction-based, or tiered)
- Value-based pricing analysis showing ROI for restaurants
- Customer acquisition cost targets and channels
- Revenue projections for first 12 months
- Pricing strategy for different restaurant segments

**WHY IT MATTERS:** Pricing must reflect real value delivered while ensuring sustainable business growth.

**CONTEXT:** Round 1 strategic foundation that will guide product packaging and market approach."
      },
      "setRoundFocus": false
    },
    {
      "productId": "temp:6",
      "assigneeIds": ["operative-3"],
      "directive": {
        "importance": "7",
        "comment": "**CORE OBJECTIVE:** Position MenuSync against competitors and define differentiation strategy.

**DEFINITION OF DONE:**
- Competitive landscape analysis of existing menu management tools
- Clear differentiation points vs competitors
- Positioning statement and value proposition
- Marketing message framework
- Competitive response strategy for feature parity pressure

**WHY IT MATTERS:** Establishes how we win in market and defend against competition.

**CONTEXT:** Foundational positioning work to guide all external communications and product strategy."
      },
      "setRoundFocus": false
    }
  ],

  "acceptance": [],

  "questionsForUser": []
}
